node.title: Trevor Noah Suggests Sending Marjorie Taylor Greene to Beijing
node.alt: “And that’s a real shame that the Americans officials won’t be at the Olympics, because you realize Kamala Harris was about to become the first Black woman to ever watch a hockey game,” Trevor Noah joked.
node.description: “If you want to get back at China, you have Marjorie Taylor Greene in the stands,” Noah said of the U.S. diplomatic boycott of the Olympics.
node.content: ["Welcome to Best of Late Night, a rundown of the previous night\u2019s highlights that lets you sleep \u2014 and lets us get paid to watch comedy. Here are the 50 best movies on Netflix right now.", "President Biden on Monday announced that the U.S. would not be sending diplomats to the 2022 Winter Olympics in Beijing, citing China\u2019s human rights abuses.", "Trevor Noah said that American diplomats would have to watch the Winter Games like the rest of us, \u201cby turning on the TV and then getting bored after three minutes and then turning it off.\u201d", "Jimmy Kimmel and Seth Meyers weighed in on news that Donald Trump came into contact with at least 500 people after testing positive for the coronavirus.", "\u201cHe\u2019s like the Johnny Appleseed of Covid,\u201d Meyers joked.", "Tig Notaro talked about going back on the road for her \u201cHello Again\u201d tour while on Monday\u2019s \u201cTonight Show.\u201d", "Kristin Davis and Cynthia Nixon will talk about their new \u201cSex and the City\u201d reboot on Tuesday\u2019s \u201cLate Show.\u201d", "Alana Haim is as surprised as anyone that she\u2019s getting rave reviews for her acting debut in \u201cLicorice Pizza.\u201d"]
